channel.title: False Apparitions on Extra Ecclesiam Nulla Salus
channel.description: Recent content in False Apparitions on Extra Ecclesiam Nulla Salus

item.title: Bayside, Medjugorje and Other False Apparitions
item.description: By Brother Peter Dimond, O.S.B. Source: vaticancatholic.com OBJECTION- Our Lady herself revealed at Bayside and Medjugorje that non-Catholics can be saved, so you are wrong. “Our Lady” of Bayside, August 14, 1979: “Do not judge your brothers and sisters who have not been converted.  For My Father’s House, My Son has repeated over and over, remember always – that in My Father’s House, there are many rooms in the Mansion, signifying faiths and creeds.
